action.content: DESCRIPTION:My grid is a 5x5 symmetric arrangement where each row mirrors its counterpart from top to bottom. The first and fifth rows both start and end with X, with three diamonds in between. The second and fourth rows have two Xs on the ends and a diamond in the middle, while the third row has an alternating pattern of X and diamonds, creating a central symmetry.
